channel.title: Starter Here
channel.description:
Let's get 1 thing out there. This is my first time to make a private server period. I need a list of programs with downloads that I need to edit a source.
1) How to I edit ".CFG" files? 2) Are ".Java" files suppose to open in ".txt" form? 3) Which source do you think is best for a beginner like me? (I want to make an almost complete copy of Runescape with no 'Level 30 ATK by hitting a dummy', with all the quests, skills, and stuff.) 4) Is there a special program I need to edit a source? 5) Do I need to edit the ".class" files? If so, how?
Much thanks in advance.

@alboblood88 wrote:

nope thats all and no problem
happy i could help

item.title: Starter Here
item.dc:creator: @KillerbeeWon KillerbeeWon
item.description:
@KillerbeeWon wrote:

virageknight:

Thanks, is there any other program besides WinRar that I need?

That should be the only program. Different sources come in different programs. Winrar and .zip are the only one most likely.

item.title: Starter Here
item.dc:creator: @virageknight virageknight
item.description:
@virageknight wrote:

Let’s get 1 thing out there. This is my first time to make a private server period.
I need a list of programs with downloads that I need to edit a source.

  1. How to I edit “.CFG” files?
  2. Are “.Java” files suppose to open in “.txt” form?
  3. Which source do you think is best for a beginner like me? (I want to make an almost complete copy of Runescape with no ‘Level 30 ATK by hitting a dummy’, with all the quests, skills, and stuff.)
  4. Is there a special program I need to edit a source?
  5. Do I need to edit the “.class” files? If so, how?

Much thanks in advance.

Read full topic
